pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, June 11, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with the President of Rwanda, Paul Kagame.

The Prime Minister will host a call with provincial and territorial premiers.

Closed to media.

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit Régimbal Awards and Promotions, to highlight how businesses are benefitting from the Canada Emergency Wage Subsidy and other economic measures. A media availability will follow.

Régimbal Awards and Promotions
5369 Canotek Road, Unit 1

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media to arrive no later than 9:45 am
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions to the Prime Minister.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 6822783#

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual dialogue with His Royal Highness The Prince of Wales, hosted by Jamaica, Canada, and the Commonwealth.
